abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project covers: (a) the
            construction and equipping of one new primary
            teacher-training college and four new agricultural secondary
            schools and (b) the expansion and modernization of 10
            existing primary teacher-training colleges and seven
            agricultural secondary schools. It also includes technical
            assistance and overseas training.
